__e: This great big town and those heels that pushed me around, it's all mine now, stretched right out on a silver platter.
The bastards who told him did us a favor.
We may hate the bastards that run this country, but this is still our home.
Wipe the sons of bitches off the face of the earth.
We're such jerks, We left her alone.
Lousy frogs. Don't worry. I got another one.
- Yeah, sure. The bastards keep upping the price.
Those bastards came and we had to burn them out.
The bastards took away my book shop.
And tonight those bastards, they trashed our house.
The first time, in Fort Lee, these animals tried to kill my wife for revenge.
